name: link-preview
title: Link Preview
oneLiner: Hover link preview component with OpenGraph metadata fetching

apiDoc.name: LinkPreview
apiDoc.description: Hover-based link preview component that fetches and displays OpenGraph metadata (title, description, image, domain) in a popover. Supports single or multiple URLs with caching and loading states. Uses bits-ui LinkPreview primitive for hover interactions.

props.name: url
props.description: URL(s) to preview - single string or array
